Posts.Content: Flt1970 wrote: Hi, I'm 47, had a hysterectomy six or seven years ago. Ive had several fibroadenomas between ages 21 and 30 but nothing since. Today, after my shower, one of my nipples was bleeding. There's no sign of a sore or scab. That same breast has been tender for a couple weeks. Thoughts?? Don't want to freak out unnecessarily but I gotta admit I'm a smidge worried. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Bleeding from nipple...hystorectomy several years ago Flt1970 MelissaDallas
